mapper.select: SELECT t.user_role_id as id, ur.name as playerName, t.qq, t.log_update_time logUpdateTime, t.is_get_rewards isGetRewards, t.user_name as userName FROM role_qq_list t, user_role ur where ur.id=t.user_role_id and ur.name like concat('%', #{playerName}, '%') and date_format(t.log_update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startTime} and date_format(t.log_update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endTime} order by t.log_update_time Desc
SELECT t.user_role_id as id, ur.name as userRoleName, t.qq FROM role_qq_list t, user_role ur where ur.id=t.user_role_id and t.user_role_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE role_qq_list SET qq = #{qq} WHERE user_role_id =#{id}
